text:
I see, fair enough! I’ve heard about that. Apparently MPC has a serious reputation for underbidding for shows and then using staff pay to compensate.

Things are good for me! My short film’s finally in comp and we’re delivering it in a couple of weeks now. We’ve also got a professional composer on board to make us a custom soundtrack for free. I’ve also started the grading and VFX for the film I worked on over the summer.
